txt.en: 'Oh there are pesky crows all throughout the wheat field. Shoo them away if you are in there. With all their squawking, it sounds like they are laughing at us!'

Ermentrude Haybank, the Maze-master of Wistmead, asks of you to shoo away pesky crows within the wheat-walls.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>
'Thank you! I hope those pesky crows do not come back.'
The Wistmead wheat maze can be found in the Wistmead Harvest Festival space.\n\nYou should talk to Ermentrude Haybank at the wheat maze entrance.
The Wistmead wheat maze can be found in the Wistmead Harvest Festival space.\n\nErmentrude Haybank has tasked you with shooing away pesky crows.
